td.content: s:a white f floor manager aged 55 yrs c/o 7 weeks h/o Body Aches. NKDA. she denies ever using cigarettes she drinks at least 4 beers a day o:Height 176 cm, Weight 44.4 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 70, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed LYRICA - 150 mg daily, and ordered ANA.

td.content: s:pt presents with Body Aches. she is a white female floor manager aged 56 Ys. denies any smoking patient has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption o:Height 176 cm, Weight 43.8 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:56 YO F floor manager presents with 6 days history of Body Aches. o:Height 176 cm, Weight 43.4 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 78, SystolicBP 104, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14 a:Fibromyalgia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed SAVELLA - 50 mg 2x day.
